JSON web key set:
https://cognito-idp.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/us-west-1_O6hpotYDA/.well-known/jwks.json

AMS Amplify CLI docs at `https://docs.amplify.aws/cli/start/install/` (note CLI tab at top of page)
AWS Amplify Libraries at `https://docs.amplify.aws/cli/auth/overview/` (note Libraries tab at top of page)

AWS Cognito main documentation page at `https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cognito/latest/developerguide/what-is-amazon-cognito.html`

AWS Cognito hosted authentication flow -- see tutorial at
`https://cloudcompiled.com/tutorials/aws-cognito-hosted-ui/`

Convert code returned from login UI to idToken -- see `https://stackoverflow.com/questions/45785898/how-to-use-the-code-returned-from-cognito-to-get-aws-credentials`

```
curl --location --request POST 'https://chemistry-teacher.auth.us-west-1.amazoncognito.com/oauth2/token' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' \
--header 'Authorization: Basic NjVyYXU0cGowNm5kZnM3cm84bjBsanBsYTE6MXFiY21lbTltdXExbXJtdjVtaG9kcDY2MW05ZjdvNG04cnB0ODNnYmdzcDVnazdqNjVzbA==' \
--data-urlencode 'grant_type=authorization_code' \
--data-urlencode 'client_id=65rau4pj06ndfs7ro8n0ljpla1' \
--data-urlencode 'code=3f01f123-19bb-4590-9b9c-a3b595218e73' \
--data-urlencode 'redirect_uri=https://www.chemistry-practice.com'
```

Retrieves id_token, access_token and refresh_token

Verify JSON token
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cognito/latest/developerguide/amazon-cognito-user-pools-using-tokens-verifying-a-jwt.html

Configure hosted web for Cognito UI
https://aws.amazon.com/premiumsupport/knowledge-center/cognito-hosted-web-ui/

Remove From Email -- need IAM ARN to spoof the email.  See `https://forums.aws.amazon.com/thread.jspa?messageID=927736`

Configure Google App for OAuth2 at `https://developers.google.com/identity/gsi/web/guides/get-google-api-clientid`

Registering app with identity providers at `https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cognito/latest/developerguide/cognito-user-pools-social-idp.html`
